overview.title: Overview
overview.text: Medusssa is web development company for startups, that allows you to rapidly build stable products using our expertise in Ruby on Rails, Angular, React and React Native.We have a very modest TechStack. And we regard this as advantage, since we know all pitfalls and best practices in those technologies. This allows us write code really fast!To make sure the product we build are not only stable but also fancy, we have internal team of designers will bring colors and joy to any start up.

leadership.title: Leadership
leadership.introduction: Medusssaâ€™s leaders bring together decades of experience in technology, development and compliance.

leaders.name: Alexey Gnetko
leaders.overview:
Hello. 
I'm a frontend developer with 4 years of experience. I have experience in design and development of rich web applications. Able to learn new technologies rapidly and in short period. 

More about my skills: 
* Creating UI design and developing top-notch UX 
* Developing responsive and mobile optimized applications with main css frameworks
* Front-end development with Javascript, Typescript and Frameworks: AngularJs and Angular
* Designing and implementing build tools using node.js/gulp/webpack
* Developing and testing web servers, APIs, tools with Node.js. Implementing microservices with Docker.
* Using complete Atlassian Stack for daily workflow.

Stack of technologies:
Javascript and Angular JS, Angular2, TypeScript, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, SASS, Materialize, JQuery, ES Lint, Grunt, Bower, npm, Gulp, WebPack, Moment JS, NodeJS, MongoDB, SQL, VSC (git), Jira, Idea, webStorm, Chrome DevTools
